tasks.task: Planting a crop in under three minutes
subtasks: Prepare the soil by tilling or loosening
Mix in fertilizer or amend soil as needed
Position the seedling trays or seeds
Carefully plant each seed or seedling at the correct depth
Cover the planted area with soil and tamp down
Water the newly planted area thoroughly
